attributes.action: stop giving money to Muslim communities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not agree with the government giving money to  certain communities.  Not only is it another divide but how to they know where the money is being spent.  The money would be better spent giving it to the soldiers who are fighting in Iraq and Afghanistan.
